text: Uye rangarira (Hud) mukoma wemaAad, apo akatsiura vanhu muAl-Ahqaaf (dzimba dzavaigadzira mumakomo muArabia). Uye zvirokwazvo kwange kwadarika vayambiri mushure make uye mberi kwake (vachiti): “Musanamata chimwe chinhu kunze kwaAllah; zvirokwazvo, ndinokutyirai kubva kumutongo wezuva guru (zuva rokumutswa).”
